textList.name: TEXT_START_TWISTED
textList.text: You have arrived in the Twisted sector. A message is transmitted to you directly by C.U.R.A. "Welcome to my lovely abandoned sector, Renegade. I took the opportunity to purchase it and detonate several prototype Multiverse Destabilization Munitions at random locations within. You should be able to call these "Twisted" individuals directly to you if you wish at these locations. This was not cheap, and I'm only allowing you to come here once so do not disappoint me, Renegade.

choice.text: Continue...

event.name: FM_START_RITUAL
event.text: You've arrived at one of this sector's unusual beacons. You perform a quick scan using the software provided by C.U.R.A., and it informs you that the anomalous properties of this beacon force anything summoned by C.U.R.A.'s specialized Drive Hacker to be pulled directly to it. The Drive Hacker only has enough energy to do this once per beacon.

choice.text: Attempt to utilize your C.U.R.A. Drive Hacker.
Nevermind, let's leave.

event.text: You decide against sticking around to try calling any vessels to the beacon. The anomalous properties of the beacon make you and your crew feel very ill, so you don't like the idea of staying here for longer than necessary.

event.name: FM_CURA_DRIVE_HACKER_MENU
event.text: You've arrived at one of this sector's unusual beacons. The anomalous properties of this beacon force anything called by the C.U.R.A. Drive Hacker to be pulled directly to it. You wonder if it could be used to pull your ship directly to such beacons in the future.

choice.text: (C.U.R.A. Drive Hacker) You already obtained your reward. You wonder how exactly this benefit C.U.R.A.?
(C.U.R.A. Drive Hacker) Obtain your Reward..
(C.U.R.A. Drive Hacker) Summon a Twisted MV Traveler.
Nevermind, let's leave.

event.text: You decide against sticking around to try calling any vessels to the beacon. The anomalous properties of the beacon make you and your crew feel very ill, so you don't like the idea of staying here for longer than necessary.
